MythicScribe.alwaysEnabled.title: Always Enabled
MythicScribe.alwaysEnabled.description: Enable MythicScribe's functionalities in all files.

MythicScribe.enableMythicScriptSyntax.title: Enable MythicScript Syntax
MythicScribe.enableMythicScriptSyntax.description: Whether the extension should automatically convert the document types from yaml to MythicScript if it's recognized as a MythicMobs file. This does not change the file or its extension in any way, while also enabling mythic-specific syntax highlighting.

MythicScribe.minecraftVersion.title: Minecraft Version
MythicScribe.minecraftVersion.description: The version of Minecraft that the extension should use for autocompletions.

MythicScribe.regexForMythicmobsFile.title: Regex for MythicMobs File
MythicScribe.regexForMythicmobsFile.description: The regex used against each document's file path: if it matches, the document will be considered as being a MythicMobs one, enabling this extension.

MythicScribe.regexForMetaskillFile.title: Regex for MythicMobs Metaskills
MythicScribe.regexForMetaskillFile.description: The regex used against each document's file path: if it matches, the document will be considered as being a Metaskills one, enabling Metaskill files functionalities.

MythicScribe.regexForMobFile.title: Regex for MythicMobs Mobs
MythicScribe.regexForMobFile.description: The regex used against each document's file path: if it matches, the document will be considered as being a Mob one, enabling Mob files functionalities.

MythicScribe.regexForItemFile.title: Regex for MythicMobs Items
MythicScribe.regexForItemFile.description: The regex used against each document's file path: if it matches, the document will be considered as being an Item one, enabling Item files functionalities.

MythicScribe.datasetSource.title: Dataset
MythicScribe.datasetSource.description: Select what dataset to use: `GitHub` fetches the latest datasets from the repository, while `Local` uses the native one that came bundled with the extension. The affected datasets are only those for mechanics, targeters, triggers and conditions

MythicScribe.enableShortcuts.title: Enable Shortcuts
MythicScribe.enableShortcuts.description: Enable text shortcuts for MythicMobs files.

MythicScribe.enableEmptyBracketsAutomati.title: Enable Empty Brackets Automatic Removal
MythicScribe.enableEmptyBracketsAutomati.description: Enable the removal of empty curly brackets `{}` by moving the cursor past them.

MythicScribe.enableFileSpecificSuggestio.title: Enable File Specific Suggestions
MythicScribe.enableFileSpecificSuggestio.description: Whether file specific suggestions (metaskill files, mob files) should be shown.

MythicScribe.disableAcceptSuggestionOnEn.title: Reminder to Remove Accept Suggestion on Enter
MythicScribe.disableAcceptSuggestionOnEn.description: Enable the reminder to disable the editor.acceptSuggestionOnEnter config.

MythicScribe.attributeAliasUsedInComplet.title: Attribute Alias Used in Completions
MythicScribe.attributeAliasUsedInComplet.description: Which attribute alias should be used in autocompletions.

MythicScribe.customDatasets.description: Load a Custom Dataset from a Local File or a Link.

elementType.description: The type of element to associate.

path.description: The local file path or URL to associate with the element type.
